articles.author: Terry Collins, Eve Chen, Lici Beveridge
articles.title: Army identifies 2 soldiers killed in helicopter, plane crash near Reagan National Airport - USA TODAY
articles.description: The Army identifiies two soldiers aboard the Black Hawk that collided midair with American Airlines plane on Wednesday. Third soldier's ID being held.
articles.content: The U.S. Army on Friday released the names of two of the three soldiers who were killed Wednesday when their Black Hawk helicopter collided with a passenger jet near Ronald Reagan Washington National… [+4632 chars]
